p.b: Question: Does visualization toolkit support Dashboard Studio?

html.p: Answer: As Dashboard Studio does no support custom visualizations, the visualization toolkit is not supported in Dashboard Studio.

p.b: Question: Does visualization toolkit support Splunk Mobile?

html.p: Answer: As Splunk Mobile app does no support custom visualizations, the visualization toolkit is not supported using Splunk Mobile.

p.b: Question: The visualization failes loading and prints out "Error rendering Visualization Toolbox visualization"

html.p: Answer: We suggest the following steps to solve this issue: First copy your options code to echarts example page (IDE) to check if there is an sytax error in your options. Second, check the data mapping: seriesDataIndexBinding, xAxisDataIndexBinding.

p.b: Question: I want to use visualization toolkit within my own business critial app. Do you have support offerings?

html.p: Answer: Generally speaking the app is free to use. You can connect to us using the github issue tracker. We will try to answer your questions as soon as possible. If this is not enough for you, we offer paid support, consulting and training for the app. Please contact us via email: XXX .
